translations.en:
: ** After a tour of the town where you stopped, you see a large library.
:closed_book: Trying to steal a book to resell it
:book: Read a book
:calendar_spiral: Look at the calendar

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
